name: Episode Poster Generator
description: Episode Poster Generator is a Jellyfin plugin that automatically creates custom episode posters using smart frame analysis, black frame detection, and configurable text styling. Perfect for filling in missing or generic episode artwork with clean, consistent visuals.

versions.changelog:
**Logging & FFmpeg Cleanup**

* Fallback to SW Decoding if HWA fails
* Reduce excessive logging
* Print HWA configuration to logs

**Letterbox Detection**

- Optional Letterbox Detection (Pillbox as well)
- Letterbox Detection Customization
- Fix missing build from 10.10.8

**Letterbox Detection**

- Optional Letterbox Detection (Pillbox as well)
- Letterbox Detection Customization

**Configuration Page Revamp**
- Fix hiding policies to show items 
- New custom CSS
- Spacing & generic cleanup
- New nested section for poster-specific setting
- Color Picker
- Transparency Picker for Colors

**All Configurations will need to be redone.**

* Track processed Episodes for Scheduled Tasks
* Choose to not extract an image if you want to just use colors
* Allow Logo positioning
* Allow episode images on all poster types if wanted
* Allow skipping frame extraction for all poster types
* Prevent re-processing previously processed posters
* Updating the poster design will make re-enable processing for posters that used the previous design
* Proper dependency injection
* SQL DB for tracking episode changes - Should track manual poster updates as well.
* Better, inline documentation and summaries

* Utilize HWA if available.
* Add a border on Cutout poster to make them more visible & pop
* More efficient frame extraction (~70% quicker!).
* HWA frame extraction (~95% quicker!!!).
* Cleanup and move some more items out of 
* Updated screenshots with new Cutout appearance.

* Add a safe area configuration for parameter padding
* Improve font handling to prevent overlapping
* Improve Standard poster text placement
* Improve Cutout poster text placement
* Better code documentation on posters
* Better padding / safe area inheritance
* Migrate all Text functionality into its own utility
* Updated screenshots to show multiple variations of each poster type
* New changelog formatting
* Summarize all poster code for better readibility

Fixes:
• Changes the build using GitHub workflows
• Fixes to get the checksum included in the manifest
First 'official' release. This is a test of the automated building process.
